WizardCantrips.Name: Acid Splash
WizardCantrips.Description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other.

WizardCantrips.Name: Chill Touch
WizardCantrips.Description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range.

WizardCantrips.Name: Dancing Lights
WizardCantrips.Description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs.

WizardCantrips.Name: Fire Bolt
WizardCantrips.Description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target.

WizardCantrips.Name: Light
WizardCantrips.Description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

WizardCantrips.Name: Mage Hand
WizardCantrips.Description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

WizardCantrips.Name: Mending
WizardCantrips.Description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin.

WizardCantrips.Name: Message
WizardCantrips.Description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message.

WizardCantrips.Name: Minor Illusion
WizardCantrips.Description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

WizardCantrips.Name: Poison Spray
WizardCantrips.Description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm.

WizardCantrips.Name: Prestidigitation
WizardCantrips.Description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

WizardCantrips.Name: Ray of Frost
WizardCantrips.Description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range.

WizardCantrips.Name: Shocking Grasp
WizardCantrips.Description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch.

WizardCantrips.Name: True Strike
WizardCantrips.Description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range.
